CustomField.formula: IF (AND(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Pending"), ISPICKVAL(Practice__c,"Project Management")), 1, IF (ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Not Needed"),0, IF (ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Complete"),0,2)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When value does not equal zero, the quote is open and pending.
CustomField.label: Quote Complete Trigger
